faults.name: upsVoltageIsLowFault
faults.message: After a black out the UPS kept the controller alive. Battery is too low so prepare for controller to go offline.

faults.name: pressureJetDeflectorAirFault
faults.message: The jet deflector air it getting too low to guarantee jet deflector functionality.

faults.name: overspeedFault
faults.message: The turbine is in the overspeed condition.

faults.name: nozzle_highCurrentFault
faults.message: The nozzle actuators consumed an unacceptable amount of current.

faults.name: nozzle_angleMismatchFault
faults.message: The nozzle gate angles are mismatched.

faults.name: jetDeflector_raisingTimeoutFault
faults.message: Jet deflector not raising fast enough or reed switch has moved.

faults.name: jetDeflector_pinRetractTimeoutFault
faults.message: Stopper pin is not retracting or the reed switch has moved.

faults.name: jetDeflector_pinExtendTimeoutFault
faults.message: Stopper pin is not extending or the reed switch has moved.

faults.name: jetDeflector_pinDidNotHoldPlateFault
faults.message: Stopper pin was extended but was not able to hold the jet deflector plate.

faults.name: jetDeflector_deployingTimeoutFault
faults.message: Jet deflector not deploying fast enough or reed switch has moved.

faults.name: generator_vibrationRmsFault
faults.message: Generator vibrations are over the rated limit.

faults.name: generator_overtorqueFault
faults.message: Generator shaft is seeing too much torque.

faults.name: generator_overTemperatureFault
faults.message: The generator temperature is over its rated limit.

faults.name: generator_motoringFault
faults.message: The turbine has been motoring for too long.

faults.name: generator_missedConnectionFault
faults.message: The generator missed the connection to sync to the grid and is now spinning to fast.

faults.name: generator_lockedShaftFault
faults.message: While connected to the grid

faults.name: generator_deviatedTemperatureFault
faults.message: The generator temperature sensors indicate an unsafe hotspot.

faults.name: generator_contactorPreReleasedFault
faults.message: Contactor position switches are not reporting correctly.

faults.name: gearRatioSlipFault
faults.message: The control panel is too hot for the components within it.

faults.name: centerDistanceShortPTOFault
faults.message: The PTO sprocket center distance is too small to keep the belt tensioned.

faults.name: centerDistanceShortNPTOFault
faults.message: The NPTO sprocket center distance is too small to keep the belt tensioned.

faults.name: centerDistanceDifferenceFault
faults.message: The difference between the PTO and NPTO center distance is too great.

faults.name: beltStretchPTOFault
faults.message: The PTO belt has stretched an undesirable amount under tension from the reference position.

faults.name: beltStretchNPTOFault
faults.message: The NPTO belt has stretched an undesirable amount under tension from the reference position.

faults.name: bearingIdlerPTO_vibrationRmsFault
faults.message: Bearing is running at high RMS vibrations.

faults.name: bearingIdlerPTO_vibrationPeakFault
faults.message: Bearing had a peak vibration spike.

faults.name: bearingIdlerPTO_temperatureFault
faults.message: Bearing is running at high temperature.

faults.name: bearingIdlerNPTO_vibrationRmsFault
faults.message: Bearing is running at high RMS vibrations.

faults.name: bearingIdlerNPTO_vibrationPeakFault
faults.message: Bearing had a peak vibration spike.

faults.name: bearingIdlerNPTO_temperatureFault
faults.message: Bearing is running at high temperature.

faults.name: bearingFlywheel_vibrationRmsFault
faults.message: Bearing is running at high RMS vibrations.

faults.name: bearingFlywheel_vibrationPeakFault
faults.message: Bearing had a peak vibration spike.

faults.name: bearingFlywheel_temperatureFault
faults.message: Bearing is running at high temperature.

faults.name: bearingDrivePTO_vibrationRmsFault
faults.message: Bearing is running at high RMS vibrations.

faults.name: bearingDrivePTO_vibrationPeakFault
faults.message: Bearing had a peak vibration spike.

faults.name: bearingDrivePTO_temperatureFault
faults.message: Bearing is running at high temperature.

faults.name: bearingDriveNPTO_vibrationRmsFault
faults.message: Bearing is running at high RMS vibrations.

faults.name: bearingDriveNPTO_vibrationPeakFault
faults.message: Bearing had a peak vibration spike.

faults.name: bearingDriveNPTO_temperatureFault
faults.message: Bearing is running at high temperature.

faults.name: relay_internalFault
faults.message: The grid protection relay reported a fault.

faults.name: relay_gridRejectionFault
faults.message: The grid protection relay triggered a grid rejection.

faults.name: powerPanelUndertempFault
faults.message: The power panel is too cold for the components within it.

faults.name: powerPanelOvertempFault
faults.message: The power panel is too hot for the components within it.

faults.name: pondDrainedFault
faults.message: The controller failed to sustain the pond level at an acceptable level.

faults.name: lowWaterFlowFault
faults.message: The flow is too low to sustain power output. Stopping and will auto restart when flows rise.

faults.name: commsFault
faults.message: The integra power meter is not communicating with the PLC.

faults.name: estopPressedFault
faults.message: Emergency stop button was pressed.

faults.name: controlPanelUndertempFault
faults.message: The control panel is too cold for the components within it.

faults.name: controlPanelOvertempFault
faults.message: The control panel is too hot for the components within it.
